name: The Paper Arcade
description:
Welcome to The Paper Arcade, a collection of classic arcade-style games with a unique twist! Immerse yourself in a world of vibrant, hand-drawn graphics that will transport you back to the golden age of arcade gaming.

Choose from a variety of games, each with its own addictive gameplay and challenges. Whether you're a fan of puzzle games or action-packed shooters, The Paper Arcade has something for everyone.

But that's not all - The Paper Arcade also features a unique drawing and sketchbook aesthetic that sets it apart from other arcade collections. Each game is brought to life with stunning hand-drawn graphics and animations, making it feel like you're playing on a piece of paper that has come to life.

So what are you waiting for? Dive into The Paper Arcade and get ready for hours of addictive, retro-style gaming fun with a unique twist!

There are multiple games from paddle tennis, space shooters and more all in your sketchbook.
